TopicTitle: Here's the one part that KSP 2 really needs, something that the first game missed.

Articles.Content:
In my opinion,  only one thing has been missing from the otherwise amazing aircraft we've seen in KSP 2 so far. That being, of course, a 1.25m dual-kerbal cockpit for our aircraft! See the modded example below (airplane plus, i believe.) In the stock game, to get a similar effect we've got to use a Mk1 inline cockpit behind a regular Mk1 cockpit, which just isn't the same. Basically, this part is integral to many aircraft designs, and it would make a great addition to KSP2.

P.S: I know the Mk2 inline cockpit exists, and it works great... on designs that use Mk2 pieces. It'd be worth having a 1.25m part for this niche as well.

Didn't the orginal Mk1 cockpit look like this before it was replaced with the GA style Mk1 Cockpit?

Agree they should have added the new one to the game instead of replacing.
